lines.text:
[Reggie force's Bella's head towards his crotch]
I hope your hungry, cos it's time for dindins! Open wide.
Percy's dribbling...
Well at least he tried.
Better to have tried and failed than not to have tried at all, I suppose.
Actually...
Yes Norman?
Merely to achieve erection isn't that important, as it happens.
Says who?
My analyst.
Well he would though, wouldn't he?
[Bella turns to Norman and laughs sarcastically]
Let's 'ave a look at granny's fanny!

[the three men are molesting an elderly homeless lady]
Eugh she's got warts!
Witches... have warts.
What we have here is an environmental problem.
So how do we solve it?
Lets burn the witch!
Ashes to ashes...
Have you ever been penetrated from behind?

[Notices Bella get something from her bag]
She's got an alarm.
No one ever comes. No one will even hear.
I know!
Bend over the hood!
Chop chop!
Three city slickers, inside your knickers...
Get on with it...
[Bella shoots Small One in the abdomen]
